Text: Re Mesa Extentionguess I spaced it here it is John NRON AM To Dave CT cc Subject Re Mesa Extention I have a couple of things this am I will call this afternoon By the way your attachment didnt get attached Send when you get a chance Thanks John

Renot on the water but close we have a community easement Where is your place Mary Hain AM To Dave CT cc Subject Re It would be my house and I listed it on Saturday Is your place on the water or are you looking for one Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Dave Fuller AM To Mary CT cc Subject Re Would that be your home I actually found one and dont want to move but the right place at the right price might cause me to Mary Hain AM To Dave CT cc Subject Are you still looking for a home in Lake Oswego One on the water I know one that will be going on the market

EWEB gas sale Cc The attached term sheet describes a gas sale we are proposing to the Eugene Water and Electric Board Please have a look and let me know how you think the actual confirm should look They have an Enfolio in legal review now Thanks Dave

Kaiser Gas Purchase AgreementAttached is my attempt at rewriting the Kaiser Agency Agreement that I sent you last Please have a look at it and let me what additional changes are needed The basic concept of the deal is simple Enron sells Kaiser Gas at index price Enron agrees to provide market and pricing information Kaiser designates Enron as agent to manage its pipeline capacity Kaiser can purchase incremental quantities of gas pursuant to the Enfolio agreement Kaiser can sell back unwanted quantities of gas pursuant to the Enfolio agreement Please let me know how quickly we can turn this around Id like to get him something this week Sincerely David Fuller Enron North America Salmon Street Portland Oregon
Missing Attachmentthe missing attachment from my previous email

Re Missing AttachmentI asked Tracy Ngo to about that yesterday you should get something today Dan J Hyvl AM To Dave CT cc Subject Re Missing Attachment Dave I am still waiting on the Credit Worksheet so that I can draft the agreement The Houston credit group claims that they have no request for this Please verify with the Credit Group so that they would provide a credit worksheet directly to me for use in preparation of the contract Otherwise let me know how your negotiations on the transactions components is proceeding Dave Fuller PM To Dan J CT cc Subject Missing Attachment Heres the missing attachment from my previous email

Mesa Restructurehave a proposed restructuring transaction with City of Mesa Arizona It works like this Half their volume is currently priced at fixed physical deal with us That deal runs through July I want to reprice that deal at a higher price and use that equity to finance a discount to index for an extra six months They will do one of two transactions shown below one extends half the volume one extends the full volume I need help with a couple of things Since they canceled their Enfolio Agmt can I get a contract from legal that will allow us to transact without it How do we get this deal in Mikes book and the risk system Thanks Dave Fuller

Re Mesa Restructuregreat Dan the extension is actually only months Aug Jan Also can we make it an ammendment to the existing deal Dan J Hyvl PM To Dave CT cc Anne nron Tori CT Subject Re Mesa Restructure DAve Once you decide which way you would like to go We will issue a new Confirmation Letter which will cancel the two previous confirmation letters effective as of February Because the term extends some months we will require them to sign the confirmation letter with attached GTC Let me know and I will generate Dave Fuller PM To Tori CT Dan J CT Anne nron cc Subject Mesa Restructure I have a proposed restructuring transaction with City of Mesa Arizona It works like this Half their volume is currently priced at fixed physical deal with us That deal runs through July I want to reprice that deal at a higher price and use that equity to finance a discount to index for an extra six months They will do one of two transactions shown below one extends half the volume one extends the full volume I need help with a couple of things Since they canceled their Enfolio Agmt can I get a contract from legal that will allow us to transact without it How do we get this deal in Mikes book and the risk system Thanks Dave Fuller

Re Mesa RestructureHeres a spread sheet that summarizes our proposed restructuring transaction Dave Dan J Hyvl AM To Dave CT cc Subject Re Mesa Restructure Dave Spoke with credit and they are permitting us to go forward without adding credit provisions In reviewing your email are both of the existing deals being modified for the period Feb through July your chart says half for each deal I will do a new GTC confirm that terminates the old and rolls the old volumes and new pricing for the period FEb through Jan O Please give me a call Dave Fuller PM To Dan J CT cc Subject Re Mesa Restructure Thats great Dan the extension is actually only months Aug Jan Also can we make it an ammendment to the existing deal Dan J Hyvl PM To Dave CT cc Anne nron Tori CT Subject Re Mesa Restructure DAve Once you decide which way you would like to go We will issue a new Confirmation Letter which will cancel the two previous confirmation letters effective as of February Because the term extends some months we will require them to sign the confirmation letter with attached GTC Let me know and I will generate Dave Fuller PM To Tori CT Dan J CT Anne nron cc Subject Mesa Restructure I have a proposed restructuring transaction with City of Mesa Arizona It works like this Half their volume is currently priced at fixed physical deal with us That deal runs through July I want to reprice that deal at a higher price and use that equity to finance a discount to index for an extra six months They will do one of two transactions shown below one extends half the volume one extends the full volume I need help with a couple of things Since they canceled their Enfolio Agmt can I get a contract from legal that will allow us to transact without it How do we get this deal in Mikes book and the risk system Thanks Dave Fuller

RE Work Hours Cc Ill phone Lucci at am tomorrow if I cant get him Ill call back at pm Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Tuesday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Lucci Paul T Subject RE Work Hours I would like to see you get on the Denver day schedule Any hours you choose from A M to PM Original Message From Fuller Dave Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Tycholiz Barry Cc Whitt Mark Subject RE Work Hours I plan to continue my normal schedule of working am to pm which coincides with noramal Houston hours covers spot gas trading covers spot power trading and overlaps with most of my customers hours in the west When necessary I will come in early or stay late Please let me know if there are any issues there Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Tuesday October AM To Bronstein Mara Felling Amy Fuller Dave Harrison Tyrell Lucci Paul T Miller Stephanie Polsky Phil Staab Theresa Ward Kim S Houston Whitt Mark Cc DuBose Heidi Subject FW Work Hours Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject FW Work Hours Please circulate to west gas Orig group Thanks BT Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Allen Phillip K Gay Randall L Heu Mog Holst Keith Huang Jason Kuykendall Tori Lenhart Matthew Lisk Daniel Reitmeyer Jay Sanchez Monique Scott Susan M Smith Matt South Steven P Sullivan Patti Tholt Jane M Tycholiz Barry Wolfe Jason Subject Work Hours Dear West We talked briefly on Monday about our commitment to a full work day at Enron If you are in the office then please be prepared to contribute to the group for a full day Our schedule now calls for critical communication in the afternoons We need to know that each employee will be here every day to create the consistency needed to outperform the rest of the market We want to remain as flexible as possible with all traders when it comes to an emergency but remember that you have a commitment to Enron to contribute a full work day Please organize your vacation on the west desk calendar with Ina and coordinate any early afternoon departures with Ina and myself Also prepare to have your markets covered when you leave the office early Sincerely Mike
FW chartsOriginal Message From Bruce James Sent Thursday October PM To Fuller Dave Subject charts James Bruce Enron North America West Power Desk c SW Salmon WTC fax Portland OR James nroncom

FW W Quotepst Original Message From Mumm Chris Sent Tuesday September AM To Oh Jeffrey Fuller Dave Bruce James Perry Todd Subject W Quote When I take action Im not going to fire a two million dollar missile at a ten dollar empty tent and hit a camel in the butt Its going to be decisive George W Bush

FW Fwd Fwd More cowspst Original Message From Dan James mailto Sent Thursday August PM To Dan Bennewitz Dave Boyer Todd Cronan Stillman Tom Email Sant Web Email Dan James John Marsh Maritz Steve Martin Paul Conroy Tom Email Fuller Dave Ted Frangos John Meyer Subject Fwd Fwd More cows Inline attachment follows From To Date Friday August GMT Subject Inline attachment follows From To Date Friday August GMT Subject A CHRISTIAN You have two cows You keep one and give one to your neighbor A SOCIALIST You have two cows The government takes one and gives itto your neighbor A REPUBLICAN You have two cows Your neighbor has none So what A DEMOCRAT You have two cows Your neighbor has none You feel guilty for being successful You vote people into office who tax your cows forcing you to sell one to raise money to pay the tax The people you voted for then take the tax money and buy at five times the true price a cow and give it to your neighbor You feel righteous A COMMUNIST You have two cows The government seizes both and provides you with sour soy milk A FASCIST You have two cows The government seizes both and sells you the milk DEMOCRACY AMERICAN STYLE You have two cows The government taxes you to the point you have to sell both to support a man in a foreign country who has only one cow which was a gift from your government CAPITALISM AMERICAN STYLE You have two cows You sell one buy a bull and build a herd of cows BUREAUCRACY AMERICAN STYLE You have two cows The government takes them both shoots one milks the other pays you for the milk then pours the milk down the drain AN AMERICAN CORPORATION You have two cows You sell one and force the other to produce the milk of four cows You are surprised when the cow drops dead A FRENCH CORPORATION You have two cows You go on strike because you want three cows A JAPANESE CORPORATION You have two cows You redesign them so they are onetenth the size of an ordinary cow and produce twenty times the milk A GERMAN CORPORATION You have two cows You reengineer them so they live for years eat once a month and milk themselves AN ITALIAN CORPORATION You have two cows but you dont know where they are You break for lunch A RUSSIAN CORPORATION You have two cows You count them and learn you have five cows You count them again and learn you have cows You count them again and learn you have cows You stop counting cows and open another bottle of vodka A MEXICAN CORPORATION You think you have two cows but you dont know what a cow looks like You take a nap A SWISS CORPORATION You have cows none of which belong to you You charge for storing them for others A BRAZILIAN CORPORATION You have two cows You enter into a partnership with an American corporation Soon you have cows and the American corporation declares bankruptcy AN INDIAN CORPORATION You have two cows You worship them

FW PNM Wholesale Power Marketing comments on the Enfolio Cc houston Gerald Here are PNMs comment on our Enfolio contract They have been sitting on it for a long time but I dont think the agreement has changed Please let me know if we can accomidate these Thanks Dave Fuller Original Message From Avalos Art mailto Sent Monday November AM To Fuller Dave Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject PNM Wholesale Power Marketing comments on the Enfolio Dave the following are PNMs Wholesale Power Marketings comments Please spell out Public Service Company of New Mexico Wholesale Power Marketing throughout the Enfolio Section should also include your customers recording equipment and tape as well Section iv apply to any Party should be capitalized Section last sentence Notify Party or its Affiliates Section please include the following sentence at the end Provided however that it is not the purpose of this Section to provide for or to permit the setoff of obligations by ENRON against Counterparty for obligations of the PNM Gas Services under contracts between ENRON and the PNM Gas Services or against the PNM Gas Services for the obligations of the Counterparty under this Master Agreement Section A first sentence and iii such New Tax is due remove comma Section Appendix Arbitration Disputes Procedures and Award Texas Law is being used Our proposal is a neutral state such as New York

Cascade Marketing Agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst Barry Attached is a memo describing the Cascade Marketing Agreement that I have been proposing I would like to have a conference call with Gerald and Mark after you have had a chance to read my memo and the agreement Thanks Dave

RE EPNG Proposal IIThanks G Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday October PM To Fuller Dave Whitt Mark Cc Miller Stephanie Tycholiz Barry Subject RE EPNG Proposal II Attached is the document with one change File EPNG Capacity Proposal IIdoc Original Message From Fuller Dave Sent Monday October PM To Whitt Mark Cc Nemec Gerald Miller Stephanie Tycholiz Barry Subject EPNG Proposal II All Here is a draft document for BP please review and comment Dave File EPNG Capacity Proposal IIdoc

RE Draft of proposed structure Energy SolutionsNonPrivilegedpst They would like Jul to be part of the deal too late I know Ill ask what they wish to do I do not believe they are hedged hard to imagine The generation they are delaying is not permitted yet and has not been in the press yet They have told me they do not have issues around showinging us the supply contract Ive asked twice Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Monday June PM To Williams Jason R Credit Fuller Dave Nemec Gerald Subject Draft of proposed structure Energy Solutions Dave lets discuss Jay I know that this does not represent the definative agreement but as a starter we would easily do part and part is where the complicated issues lie We clearly need to understand the contractual arrangements they have with the third party if we go with part Dave what are their plans to liquidate their july position Do they have any hedges on now What generation asset are they delaying important info Get ENA a copy of all purchase and sale agreements including executed copiesoriginals Make sure that they do not have confidentiality issues related to the confirms If they do not then we can look at them if they do have CA issues then Gerald is advising me that they will need the consent of the seller to let ENA look at agreements BT File energysolutionsdoc
Boeing ContractNonPrivilegedpst Gerald This is the contract that Boeing requires for their suppliers Let me know what you think Dave Fuller

RE Work Hours Cc Oh good sorry about the CYA email Right now Im focused on this tax issue with BP Im not convinced I have the right guy any suggestions for a tax expert Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Whitt Mark Subject RE Work Hours I was going to add a footnote to this note but thought I didnt need to as I know for a fact by individual that we do not have any issues in West Gas Orig This note was for your information only to reflect the increased level of expectations that Mike holds his trading organization to and I support this completely Your work hours are not in question nor are those of Denver and Houston based origination However I will reiterate that we need to get back to basics and stay focused and I will promote that message given every opportunity BT Original Message From Fuller Dave Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Tycholiz Barry Cc Whitt Mark Subject RE Work Hours I plan to continue my normal schedule of working am to pm which coincides with noramal Houston hours covers spot gas trading covers spot power trading and overlaps with most of my customers hours in the west When necessary I will come in early or stay late Please let me know if there are any issues there Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Tuesday October AM To Bronstein Mara Felling Amy Fuller Dave Harrison Tyrell Lucci Paul T Miller Stephanie Polsky Phil Staab Theresa Ward Kim S Houston Whitt Mark Cc DuBose Heidi Subject FW Work Hours Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject FW Work Hours Please circulate to west gas Orig group Thanks BT Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Allen Phillip K Gay Randall L Heu Mog Holst Keith Huang Jason Kuykendall Tori Lenhart Matthew Lisk Daniel Reitmeyer Jay Sanchez Monique Scott Susan M Smith Matt South Steven P Sullivan Patti Tholt Jane M Tycholiz Barry Wolfe Jason Subject Work Hours Dear West We talked briefly on Monday about our commitment to a full work day at Enron If you are in the office then please be prepared to contribute to the group for a full day Our schedule now calls for critical communication in the afternoons We need to know that each employee will be here every day to create the consistency needed to outperform the rest of the market We want to remain as flexible as possible with all traders when it comes to an emergency but remember that you have a commitment to Enron to contribute a full work day Please organize your vacation on the west desk calendar with Ina and coordinate any early afternoon departures with Ina and myself Also prepare to have your markets covered when you leave the office early Sincerely Mike

RE Work Hours Cc I plan to continue my normal schedule of working am to pm which coincides with noramal Houston hours covers spot gas trading covers spot power trading and overlaps with most of my customers hours in the west When necessary I will come in early or stay late Please let me know if there are any issues there Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Tuesday October AM To Bronstein Mara Felling Amy Fuller Dave Harrison Tyrell Lucci Paul T Miller Stephanie Polsky Phil Staab Theresa Ward Kim S Houston Whitt Mark Cc DuBose Heidi Subject FW Work Hours Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject FW Work Hours Please circulate to west gas Orig group Thanks BT Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Allen Phillip K Gay Randall L Heu Mog Holst Keith Huang Jason Kuykendall Tori Lenhart Matthew Lisk Daniel Reitmeyer Jay Sanchez Monique Scott Susan M Smith Matt South Steven P Sullivan Patti Tholt Jane M Tycholiz Barry Wolfe Jason Subject Work Hours Dear West We talked briefly on Monday about our commitment to a full work day at Enron If you are in the office then please be prepared to contribute to the group for a full day Our schedule now calls for critical communication in the afternoons We need to know that each employee will be here every day to create the consistency needed to outperform the rest of the market We want to remain as flexible as possible with all traders when it comes to an emergency but remember that you have a commitment to Enron to contribute a full work day Please organize your vacation on the west desk calendar with Ina and coordinate any early afternoon departures with Ina and myself Also prepare to have your markets covered when you leave the office early Sincerely Mike

RE Sumas cash trade Cc Chris My email probably was a bit out of line sent out of frustration my apologies It was not wise of me to give a trader a heads up on my intent to buy in the first place going forward I will not do that I have no expectation of having Stephan manage anyones price risk I am hoping to develop Cascade into a longterm Enron customer I make no origination on the deals I have done with them I have encouraged them to enter into longer term DI deals and I have hooked them up with EOL all intended to benefit of the cash desk in Calgary Next time the market falls immediately following a trade I make on behalf of a customer Ill keep my mouth email shut There is no offence intended by either of these emails and I intend to continue to try and develop more spot and term business for your desk Dave Original Message From Dorland Chris Sent Thursday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Tycholiz Barry Brodeur Stephane Subject Sumas cash trade Dave I just wanted to touch base with you on the cash trade that you intermediated between Stephane and Cascade this morning I dont really feel that it is Stephanes responsibility to manage Cascades price risk and I think that you are out of line for accusing him of running over your customer If you would like we could look at doing an MSA with Cascade where by we could sell them gas at Sumas DI Chris

FW Sumas cash tradeOriginal Message From Fuller Dave Sent Thursday October AM To Dorland Chris Cc Tycholiz Barry Brodeur Stephane Subject RE Sumas cash trade Chris My email probably was a bit out of line sent out of frustration my apologies It was not wise of me to give a trader a heads up on my intent to buy in the first place going forward I will not do that I have no expectation of having Stephan manage anyones price risk I am hoping to develop Cascade into a longterm Enron customer I make no origination on the deals I have done with them I have encouraged them to enter into longer term DI deals and I have hooked them up with EOL all intended to benefit of the cash desk in Calgary Next time the market falls immediately following a trade I make on behalf of a customer Ill keep my mouth email shut There is no offence intended by either of these emails and I intend to continue to try and develop more spot and term business for your desk Dave Original Message From Dorland Chris Sent Thursday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Tycholiz Barry Brodeur Stephane Subject Sumas cash trade Dave I just wanted to touch base with you on the cash trade that you intermediated between Stephane and Cascade this morning I dont really feel that it is Stephanes responsibility to manage Cascades price risk and I think that you are out of line for accusing him of running over your customer If you would like we could look at doing an MSA with Cascade where by we could sell them gas at Sumas DI Chris

RE Administrative Changes Cc Unfortunately all my money is tied up in Caymen Island Partnerships Original Message From Gustafson Mollie Sent Friday October AM To Fuller Dave Subject FW Administrative Changes Cough it up Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Friday October AM To Gustafson Mollie Subject RE Administrative Changes Make sure Fuller pays up I know he has some money hidden somewhere thanks BT Original Message From Gustafson Mollie Sent Wednesday October PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject FW Administrative Changes I am sure you already know this you owe me for babysitting fees Original Message From Gustafson Mollie Sent Wednesday October PM To Choi Paul Rosman Stewart Malowney John Bruce James Bryson Jesse Buerkle Jim Burry Jessica Cadena Angela Calger Christopher F Clark Ed Donovan Terry W Elafandi Mo Eriksson Fredrik Etringer Michael Gilbert Jim Guillaume David Gustafson Mollie Lackey Chris Mainzer Elliot Mumm Chris Oh Jeffrey Page Jonalan Perry Todd Shields Jeff Slaughter Jeff G Thomas Jake Thome Stephen Van Gelder John Villeggiante Theresa Wente Laura Woodland Andrea Cc Davidson Debra Axford Kathy Mehrer Anna Chatterton Jill Sheppard Kathryn Butler Emily Hall Erin Ausenhus Kara Kearney Julie Rodriguez Grace Deas Patty Blackburn Jody King Jan M Belden Tim Zavala Cristina Hrach April Fuller Dave Subject Administrative Changes In order to provide the appropriate administrative support for Origination and MidMarketing the Origination administrative group is redistributing responsibilities Please know that we work as a team and support each other Should you need support when your assistant is unavailable please see another assistant in our group Listed below are the changes This is effective immediately Mollie Gustafson Jessica Burry Theresa Villeggiante Chris Calger Paul Choi Steve Thome Jake Thomas John Malowney Laura Wente Jeff Shields Stewart Rosman JonAlan Page Jeff Slaughter John Van Gelder Todd Perry Ed Clark Jim Buerkle Angela Cadena Jim Gilbert Chris Lackey Andrea Woodland Mike Etringer Elliot Mainzer Fredrik Eriksson Dave Fuller Jesse Bryson David Guillaume Chris Mumm Mo Elafandi James Bruce Please let me know if you have any questions Thank you for your patience and understanding during this transition Mollie

RE Williamette Enovative Cc Alan My sincerest apologies please keep me posted on what happens Id like to buy you lunch sometime soon and talk about how we can avoid these situations in the future I think if we get master documents in place and convey to you a better understanding of our corporate structure youll find Enron easy to deal with flexible responsive and competitive Ill call you soon in hopes we can get together Dave Original Message From Alan Meyer mailto Sent Friday October AM To Fuller Dave Subject RE Williamette Enovative Dave Thanks Roger called and I am now working with Annette now to try to get things wrapped up Alan Meyer Willamette Industries Inc Voice Fax Email mailto Original Message From Fuller Dave mailto Sent Friday October AM To Alan Meyer Subject RE Williamette Enovative Alan I tracked down Roger and insisted he get in touch with you AT ONCE Please let me know if he does not Dave Original Message From Alan Meyer mailto Sent Friday October AM To Reynolds Roger Cc Fuller Dave Subject RE Williamette Enovative Importance High Roger I hope youre reading your Email because I cant get to you by phone Our attorney is checking the contract TCs but I noticed that none of the corrected company information I provided the last time around is included The name of our company is incorrect You have Ralph Mills name with my address phone number and my incorrect fax number The facility name is incorrect and the street name is misspelled All of this was correct on the last copy I sent you Plus there is no customer contact information on the second page Since the file is protected I cant even correct this How are we going to get this fixed in the next hours Alan Meyer Corporate Energy Manager Willamette Industries Inc Voice Fax Email mailto Original Message From Reynolds Roger mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Subject FW Williamette Enovative File Williamettedoc Original Message From Reynolds Roger Sent Thursday October PM To Cc Willis Annette Subject FW Williamette Enovative Please find enclosed the revised contract If Alan could fax me back the last page of the signed contract I will forward to legal who will then sign the pipeline agreement Thanks for your help Roger Original Message From Dietrich Sarah Sent Thursday October AM To Reynolds Roger Cc Hillegonds Jennifer Subject Williamette Enovative Here is the Williamette Enovative There are some blanks that still need to be filled in as you will see See section for the Balancing Language We have revised the Default section to give extra days from our notice to them before they are in default for late payments We have also revised the Change in law provision to permit them to either pay the extra or the agreement will be terminated The multiple monthly pricing has been listed as you will see and the Delivery Point defined as the Meter The agreement also states under quantity that is a full requirements agreement I think that covers it If I FW Enrons Hedging Model Cc This was forwarded to me by Paul Kaufman Todays GD reports that the Colorado PUC is seeking public comments on policy changes necessary to provide price stability for customers The article states that the PUC is seeking comments on methods requiring utilities to hedge more of their gas supply requiring utilities to offer an optional service that would be less volatile than standard offer service and implementing gas unbundling to give customers supplier choice Apparently the Commission has received comments from the states LDCs and maybe others although the article didnt speak to them It is asking for another round of comments which are due June th I recommend that we file comments which advocate our hedging proposal including weather products

Re LP Meeting Forwarded by Dave FullerPDXECT on PM John Malowney PM To Dave CT cc Subject Re LP Meeting Dave as youll see our presentation was well received Ive spoken to Roger a couple of times and next week theyll be meeting with management to obtain their approval of our concept following that Ill be working on them to using Enron exclusively If we are successful they will be expecting us to develop and manage the whole portfolio I appreciate your help and look forward to working together on this John Forwarded by John MalowneyHOUECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Bob Buckingham Bob PCorpcom PM To cc Subject Re LP Meeting John Some inside skinnyyou guys are in the catbird seat to take this thing big time Congratulations Bob Original Message From To Bob Buckingham Bob PCorpcom Date Friday April AM Subject Re LP Meeting Well I appreciate the feedback I feel both Roger and Jeff liked and understood the concept but were concerned we controlled the number I liken it to checking in the paper as to what the Prime interest rate is prior to negotiating a home loan Once you know the relative interest rate you talk to a few mortgage bankers regarding points services etc and then move forward I would hope this is what LP would do and naturally Id hope they would move forward with us John Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From Bob Buckingham picpcx Bob PCorpcom AM To John Malowney cc Subject LP Meeting John Sounds like you guys were quite a hit yesterday Ive heard from Roger and several other sources that the presentation was very well received Cinch up your belt things are getting fun Bob Buckingham

Mesa ExampleHeres what you have to deal with at Mesa Im gonna make one more run at this and shes alllllll yours Maybe we should meet in AZ some time in Feb we can go see Jan Hutchens etc Does Tucson have any power shorts Were trying to sell a toll on LVII and I thought they might be interested if they are short Your Friend Dave Forwarded by Dave FullerPDXECT on AM on AM To cc Subject Today is January th I am out of the office almost all day today however I wanted to let you know I had a brief chat with Dave Plumb At this point he does not think Enron is offering us a good deal mostly because the is only on the half load and not the total and originally in Deal One it was on the full load He did like that the had come down to I was set back a little by his next remark which was There is no hurry because I want to take this to the Utilities Committee of Council and they dont meet until next week I told him the numbers would change significantly if we waited until February Again he replied Jan I want to take this to the Utilities Committee anyway He also indicated about working within a range So probably tomorrow I will put the pencil to the paper and try to make something presentable for him to take to the Utilities Committee It will have to be in laymans terms and easy to follow numbers because these guys dont deal in this every day I am a little miffed that he thinks and wants to go to the Committee first We have never done that before Usually we just get a deal worked up present it in an affirmative manner to the City Manager and he buys off on it So we will see He is the boss I am telling you all of this because I will probably be asking for your help to make this in a presentable manner Talk to you later today or tomorrow for sure I am in the office all day Thursday Thanks Dave Jan

FW Sumas cash tradeOriginal Message From Fuller Dave Sent Thursday October AM To Dorland Chris Cc Tycholiz Barry Brodeur Stephane Subject RE Sumas cash trade Chris My email probably was a bit out of line sent out of frustration my apologies It was not wise of me to give a trader a heads up on my intent to buy in the first place going forward I will not do that I have no expectation of having Stephan manage anyones price risk I am hoping to develop Cascade into a longterm Enron customer I make no origination on the deals I have done with them I have encouraged them to enter into longer term DI deals and I have hooked them up with EOL all intended to benefit of the cash desk in Calgary Next time the market falls immediately following a trade I make on behalf of a customer Ill keep my mouth email shut There is no offence intended by either of these emails and I intend to continue to try and develop more spot and term business for your desk Dave Original Message From Dorland Chris Sent Thursday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Tycholiz Barry Brodeur Stephane Subject Sumas cash trade Dave I just wanted to touch base with you on the cash trade that you intermediated between Stephane and Cascade this morning I dont really feel that it is Stephanes responsibility to manage Cascades price risk and I think that you are out of line for accusing him of running over your customer If you would like we could look at doing an MSA with Cascade where by we could sell them gas at Sumas DI Chris

Tax Question Cc Kim Ive attached a spreadsheet that Id like to use as an illustration for our phone call I wont bother explaining it here but if you could print it out for our call that would be great Thanks Dave

RE Income Tax IssueIm waiting on a callback right now You are welcome to join in Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Monday October AM To Fuller Dave Subject RE Income Tax Issue What time are you meeting today Do you want me to participate Original Message From Fuller Dave Sent Friday October PM To Cc Whitt Mark Miller Stephanie Subject Income Tax Issue Hello Penny It was nice meeting you and your associates yesterday I presented the income tax issue that we discussed to some of our accountants and they see things a little differently It is our opinion that since a cash payment would be offset by the demand charge obligations associated with the capacity contract it is not income per se but rather funds dedicated to meeting an outofthemoney contract obligation Depending on your accounting method that money would probably be amortized over the term of the contract Let me know what you think perhaps we should have our accountants talk As for adjusting the cash amount after the San JuanPermian allocation issue is settled Im not sure you could hear all that at your end of the table we are not really interested in any type of post assignment trueups But we are willing to talk about what those allocation percentages should be Regarding next steps on Monday I will provide you with some alternative forms of payment and some ways we might spread the payments out After that we will look to you guys for your preferred deal structure and payment terms Ill follow up this email with a phone call today Dave Fuller Enron North America

FW Clatskanie PUD RFP for Gas Supply Wauna Cc FYI Original Message From Ann Donnelly mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Fuller Dave Cc Ken Mey Clatskanie Subject Clatskanie PUD RFP for Gas Supply Wauna It was a pleasure to see you and Mark Whitt at the Ziff conference As I mentioned Clatskanie has elected to proceed with negotiations with another supplier based upon a proposal providing multiyear primary firm Williams transportation to Deer Island And as we discussed sometime during November as plant operations approach it would be appropriate for you and Jeff Shields to get together with the EWEB and Clatskanie folks to present your ideas suggested in your proposal for mutual business opportunities among Enron Clatskanie and EWEB Give me a call at that time and we will coordinate a phone call or meeting Thank you for your participation in our RFP Ann T Donnelly PhD Principal Consultant Power Resource Managers LLP C Street Suite Vancouver WA Phone Fax email Website httpwwwprmllpcom

Re ISDA Worksheet Public Utility District of Clark County Washingtonsupposed to get their comments today I thought there was a section on margining in the draft I sent them Let me investigate and Ill let you know Also there are some seriuos legal questions regarding their authority to do a pure financial transaction Ill keep you up to date on this too Jason R NRON AM To Tana CT cc Tracy CT Christian CT Sara CT Dave CT Subject ISDA Worksheet Public Utility District of Clark County Washington Tana Attached is the ISDA worksheet for Clark County Washington You will note that this worksheet indicates no collateral threshold as Clark County is a counterparty that will require a contract where we maintain no collateral rights NOTE TO TRACY AND DAVE If you feel like we can get Clark County PUD to agree to margin rights then we should obviously try to put a draft in front of them with a threshold and margin rights Please let me know your thoughts on this issue Thanks Jay
